name: Project Eternal Folklore
description:
Project Eternal Folklore, is a 3d fps game made at unity, where the player has to pass through several procedurally generated rooms, killing the monsters that are based on diverse folklore from different cultures, once dead, will have to go back to the first room and try again.

We choose to use a 3d low poly art style, to bring our identity to the classic folklore, the music and effects are aggressive, to bring a cool shooter vibe

This game is being developed by two game design students from brazil:
Marcus Vinicius Poletti Toso: Programming

João Pedro dos Santos Pereira: Art
